title: App Store (com.apple.appstore)
description: The payload that configures macOS App Store restrictions.

restrict-store-require-admin-to-install.title: Require Admin To Install
restrict-store-require-admin-to-install.description: If 'true', the system restricts app installations to admin users only. Deprecated in macOS 10.14. Use the 'com.apple.SoftwareUpdate' payload key 'restrict-software-update-require-admin-to-install' instead.

restrict-store-softwareupdate-only.title: Restrict app installations to software updates only
restrict-store-softwareupdate-only.description: If 'true', the system prevents App Store from launching. Available in macOS 10.14 and later. Restricts installations to software updates only in macOS 10.10 through 10.13.

restrict-store-disable-app-adoption.title: Disable App Adoption by users
restrict-store-disable-app-adoption.description: If 'true', the system disables app adoption by users. Available in macOS 10.10 and later.

DisableSoftwareUpdateNotifications.title: Disable software update notifications
DisableSoftwareUpdateNotifications.description: If 'true', the system disables software update notifications. Available in macOS 10.10 and later.

restrict-store-mdm-install-softwareupdat.title: Restrict app installations to MDM-installed apps and software updates
restrict-store-mdm-install-softwareupdat.description: Restrict app installations to MDM-installed apps and software updates
